ygData.subject: Re: Heard Brewing was nerfed, is pottery still profitable?
ygData.msgSnippet: Pottery is still ok...but i fail more than before.
ygData.messageBody:
Pottery is still ok...but i fail more than before.

Sean Kennedy wrote:

> From: "Sean Kennedy" <orang@...>
>
> >From: "Park, Samuel" <Samuel.Park@...>
> >
> >Heard Brewing was nerfed, is pottery still profitable as of this morning?
> >
>
> Haven't tried today. Probably. I read a message from
> someone on the bard's list that was level 12 and had
> a full suit of bronze armor, and 250pp in bank. That's
> just nuts. Of course, if they want to sit there doing
> nothing but pottery for the time it takes to accomplish
> that, then that's their business. I only made a char
> to take it up because I lost everything to a bug. It was
> the fastest way to recover enough money to re-equip.
>
